snippet.title: Terminus PC Game (Gauntlet Mode)
snippet.description: This is the a great game that is available for for MAC, Linux, and Windows from Vicarius Visions.  This game is truly revolutionary.  This game allowed RPG style play along with Newtonian physics for space flying and battles.  The streaks on the video are there to show what direction you are traveling, as you can rotate freely about that velocity vector and fire weapons and such.
